event.name: Third Eye Craft Affair
event.tagline: Kick off the holidays with crafts, cannabis, and community.
event.age_policy: Must be 21+ or 18+ with valid med-card to participate.
event.poster_copy_raw:
CELEBRATE THE SEASON WITH US AT OUR FINAL EVENT OF THE YEAR!
 WE ARE PULLING OUT ALL THE STOPS TO CREATE A MEMORABLE
 EXPERIENCE FOR EVERYONE! ENJOY MUSIC FROM GANJA GIRL, VNMS,
 CHEF SURGE, JUAN TREVIÑO, K LALA, BASS OWL & NASTY NATE!
 INDULGE IN DELICIOUS OFFERINGS FROM BEN’S ISLAND GRINDZ!
 AND ALSO CHECK OUT OUR SPONSORED DAB AND FLOWER BAR,
 KNOWN AS THE EMERALD CITY! FOLLOW THE YELLOW BRICK ROAD!
 DON’T MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY TO SUPPORT LOCAL ARTISANS!
 BRING YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY ALONG FOR A DAY FILLED WITH FUN,
 CREATIVITY AND COMMUNITY SPIRIT!!! WE’VE GOT AMAZING VENDORS,
 FUN AND GAMES WITH GAME WARDEN GABBY, AND AN
 ALL AROUND AWESOME VIBRANT ATMOSPHERE!
 IT’S THE PERFECT WAY TO KICK OFF THE HOLIDAYS!
MUST BE 21 OR 18+ WITH VALID MED-CARD TO PARTICIPATE

background_primary.name: Deep Night Purple
background_primary.usage: Site body background, hero sections, footer backgrounds.

accent_primary.name: Portal Magenta
accent_primary.usage: Section headers, borders, key accents, links on light backgrounds.

accent_secondary.name: Solstice Orange
accent_secondary.usage: Primary buttons, CTA backgrounds, badges, important icons.

highlight.name: Moon Glow Gold
highlight.usage: Button text on dark backgrounds, small highlight text, rating stars or decorative lines.

panel_light.name: Frosted Lilac
panel_light.usage: Card backgrounds, content panels layered over dark backgrounds.

panel_lighter.name: Snow Mist
panel_lighter.usage: Main content background, long-form text sections, FAQ blocks.

divider.name: Evergreen Shadow
divider.usage: Thin dividers, borders, and subtle outlines; secondary button outlines.
